level.heading: Commission members from District.
level.text: The 7 Commission members from the District of Columbia shall be:
The Mayor of the District of Columbia;
The Chairman of the Council of the District of Columbia;
The Chairperson of the Committee on Education of the Council of the District of Columbia;
The President of the Board of Education of the District of Columbia;
The Superintendent of Schools of the District of Columbia;
The Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the University of the District of Columbia; and
The President of the University of the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 38-3002.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-65
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-65, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 38-2301.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: The "Committee on Education of the Council of the District of Columbia," referred to in paragraph (3), has been changed to the "Committee on Education and Libraries" by Resolution 7-1 which adopted the Rules Resolution for Council Period VII, effective January 2, 1987.
